item.description:
Some people have requested going to an Asian restaurant...I picked Chinese! I really have been searching hard for an authentic Chinese restaurant in CT like the ones in NY, but most have americanized Chinese foods or fusion cuisine. One that stands out is Formosa Restaurant. If my Chinese parents like it, it must be good! Formosa has the typical Chinese and sushi menu, but if you are adventuresome, there is the delicious, authentic Chinese menu (mainly Szechuan and Chengdu cuisine, also a hot pot menu). Please go to their website to look at the menu: http://www.restaurant...
They are very accomodating and told me that they can make something if it is not on the menu. Please be courteous and show up if you RSVP "yes" because sometimes there are people wait listed who don't have the chance to go. I hope to see you there. (only 40 min. from Hartford) Xie xie!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the round tables set up

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Formosa Restaurant
